channel.title: Steam Coupon and Gift trading Thread
channel.description:
I guess with the release coming up, peeps would like to get rid of their dusty coupons lying around in the steam inventory.
So anybody got a Source game coupon - then post it here. Trade suggestions should be closed in on PM, while taken offers should be posted back here.
I'll start with a [b]75% off of Portal 2 coupon[/b], [u]valid through 14. September[/u]. Whaddayougot?

item.title: Steam Coupon and Gift trading Thread
item.dc:creator: Charli
item.description:
I got the first Portal game to trade and another one of those -75% Coupons for Portal 2.

I’d be interested in Dota 2 items, especially couriers :3, or just any other games.

Read full topic
